traits.Pounce: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.Multiattack: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
